Question: Shenzhen Yijian Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Yijian Technology Co., Ltd.

Product: Unveiled latest consumer electronic products and innovative technologies at CES 2024

- Featured products and technologies in areas such as 5G, AI, AR/VR, digital medicine, robotics, smart city, smart home, space technology, vehicle technology, Web3, and the metaverse
- Exhibition area covering around 220,000 square meters
- Over 4,000 exhibitors and expected to welcome more than 130,000 visitors
- Majority of Chinese exhibitors represent startups and small to medium-sized enterprises
- Focus on AI, mixed reality, and intelligent vehicles
- Highlighted presence of Shenzhen enterprises at the fair
- Display of advanced imaging solutions, laser display technology, and LiDAR technology
- Showcasing car-integrated and home appliances, including new integrated projection curtain and ALPD 5.0 super full-color laser technology
